title.rendered: Estates Gazette interview: Alvarium’s Home REIT on using private capital for public good

excerpt.rendered: In a world crying out for good news, the stock market listing of Home REIT last month offered the right message at the right time. The £240m deal was not only a lift for London’s lacklustre initial public offering market, but also a reminder of the difference that the real estate industry can make to society when it is most needed.
